title: 저작자 목록-CN
content:
[[module CSS]]
.content-panel.standalone {
  padding: 20px 30px;
}
.sp-art-title {
  font-size: 200%;
  font-weight: bold;
  margin-bottom: 10px;
}
[[/module]]
[[div class="content-panel centered standalone series"]]
[[image http://mirrors.creativecommons.org/presskit/buttons/88x31/png/by-nc-sa.eu.png width="300px" link="http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/deed.ko"]]
(cc) users of SCP-CN, some rights reserved.

**주의:**  CC by-sa를 라이선스로 사용하는 영어 위키 및 한국어 위키와 달리 중국 위키는 CC by-nc-sa를 라이선스로 사용하고 있습니다. 본 저작자 목록에 링크된 중국 위키 저작물들의 번역물들 또한 그 원본의 라이선스를 따라 한국어 위키의 다른 저작물들과 달리 CC by-nc-sa를 따릅니다.
[[/div]]
[[div class="content-panel standalone series"]]
[[div class="sp-art-title unmargined"]]
= SCP-CNs Credits
----
[[/div]]
* [[[SCP-CN-010]]] is based on "[http://scp-wiki-cn.wikidot.com/scp-cn-010 SCP-CN-010]" by "[[user Areyoucrazytom]]"
* [[[SCP-CN-046]]] is based on "[http://scp-wiki-cn.wikidot.com/scp-cn-046 SCP-CN-046]" by "Holy_Darklight"
* [[[SCP-CN-128]]] is based on "[http://scp-wiki-cn.wikidot.com/scp-cn-128 SCP-CN-128]" by "DrParallax"
* [[[SCP-CN-463]]] is based on "[http://scp-wiki-cn.wikidot.com/scp-cn-463 SCP-CN-463]" by "[[user Veleafer]]"
* [[[SCP-CN-985]]] is based on "[http://ja.scp-wiki.net/scp-cn-985 SCP-CN-985]" by "[[user natuki]]",
 * which is based on "[http://scp-wiki-cn.wikidot.com/scp-cn-985 SCP-CN-985]" by "[[user EdwardC]]"
* [[[SCP-CN-994]]] is based on "[http://ja.scp-wiki.net/scp-cn-994 SCP-CN-994]" by "[[user snoj]]",
 * which is based on "[http://scp-wiki-cn.wikidot.com/scp-cn-994 SCP-CN-994]" by [[user AndyBlocker]]
* [[[SCP-CN-1000]]] is based on "[http://scp-int.wikidot.com/scp-cn-1000 SCP-CN-1000]" by [[user Cynthia7979]],
 * which is based on "[http://scp-wiki-cn.wikidot.com/scp-cn-1000 SCP-CN-1000]" by [[user Infas12]]
[[/div]]
[[div class="content-panel standalone series"]]
[[div class="sp-art-title unmargined"]]
= Tale-CNs Credits
----
[[/div]]
* [[[f4k|]]] is based on "[http://scp-wiki-cn.wikidot.com/f4k 基金会4K]" by "[[user QBLevi]]"
 * [[[human-in-contain|]]] is based on "[http://scp-wiki-cn.wikidot.com/human-in-contain 人类，已收容]" by "[[user QBLevi]]"
* [[[scpcn1000contesthub|]]] is based on "[http://scp-wiki-cn.wikidot.com/scpcn1000contesthub SCP-CN-1000 “流传” 竞赛中心页]" by "[[user M Element]]"
* [[[2521-xxx|]]] is based on "[http://scp-wiki-cn.wikidot.com/2521-xxx ●●|●●●●●|●●|●-xxx]" by "[[user Ivi-Jinn]]"
* [[[white-queen-to-d8|]]] is based on "[http://scp-wiki-cn.wikidot.com/white-queen-to-d8 白后至D8]" by "[[user heartlessed]]"
[[/div]]
[[div class="content-panel standalone series"]]
[[div class="sp-art-title unmargined"]]
= Other-CNs Credits
----
[[/div]]

 * which is based on "[http://scp-wiki-cn.wikidot.com/groups-of-interest-cn 中国相关组织]" by various artists
